Navigation
Rotate perspective viewsRight Click Mouse
Pan view inCtrl + Page Up
Pan view outCtrl + Page Down
Zoom view inScroll wheel Up
Zoom view outScroll wheel Down
Constrain to view rotation to horizontal or verticalCtrl + Shift + Right click + Shift
Selection
Select polysurfacesCtrl +Shift + Left click
Select Surface faces Ctrl +Shift + Left click
Select polysurface/surface edgesCtrl +Shift + Left click
Select polysurface/surface boundariesCtrl +Shift + Left click
Select polysurface/surface mesh facesCtrl +Shift + Left click
Select polysurface/surface objects within groupsCtrl +Shift + Left click
Remove object from selectionCtrl + Left click
